abstract: Closing arguments are heard in case against Ross W Ulbricht, accused of running online back market website Silk Road; prosecution says site was Ulbricht's obsession and livelihood while defense argues that it was started as experiment and that Ulbricht was framed.
lead_paragraph: Jurors are expected to begin deliberations on Wednesday in the trial of Ross W. Ulbricht, who is accused of operating the online black market.

headline.main: In Closing Arguments, Conflicting Accounts of Man’s Role in Silk Road
headline.print_headline: In Closing Arguments, Conflicting Accounts of Man’s Role in Illicit Website

snippet: Jurors are expected to begin deliberations on Wednesday in the trial of Ross W. Ulbricht, who is accused of operating the online black market.
